internal.content:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';

export default HomepageTemplate;

## Get Started

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Overview"
    subTitle="Cloud Pak for Integration Overview"
    href="/overview"
    >

![](../images/concepts.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Early Sales Demos"
    subTitle="Videos and Clickthru Demos for your early sales meetings"
    href="/esd"
    >

![](../images/prereqs.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Get Started with CP4I on ROKS"
    subTitle="Setup your own Cloud Pak for Integration environment in ROKS for live demos"
    href="/cp4i-on-roks"
    >

![](../images/multi-cloud.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Sales Demos"
    subTitle="Usecase driven Sales Demos"
    href="/community"
    >

![](../images/lecture-cloud.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Learn with Labs"
    subTitle="Explore or Demo Cloud Pak for Integration Capabilities"
    href="/tutorials"
    >

![](../images/activities.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Contribute"
    subTitle="Submit your requests or contributions"
    href="/contribute"
    >

![](../images/resources.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

MdxNode.rawBody:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';

export default HomepageTemplate;

## Get Started

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Overview"
    subTitle="Cloud Pak for Integration Overview"
    href="/overview"
    >

![](../images/concepts.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Early Sales Demos"
    subTitle="Videos and Clickthru Demos for your early sales meetings"
    href="/esd"
    >

![](../images/prereqs.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Get Started with CP4I on ROKS"
    subTitle="Setup your own Cloud Pak for Integration environment in ROKS for live demos"
    href="/cp4i-on-roks"
    >

![](../images/multi-cloud.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Sales Demos"
    subTitle="Usecase driven Sales Demos"
    href="/community"
    >

![](../images/lecture-cloud.jpg)

</ArticleCard>

</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Learn with Labs"
    subTitle="Explore or Demo Cloud Pak for Integration Capabilities"
    href="/tutorials"
    >

![](../images/activities.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Contribute"
    subTitle="Submit your requests or contributions"
    href="/contribute"
    >

![](../images/resources.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
